message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this amazing product that I think you'll really love. I'm offering it to you for $150. Let me know what you think!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Can you meet me at that price?
Bob, I appreciate your interest! $120 is a bit lower than I was hoping for, but I'm willing to come down to $135. How about we split the difference?
I'm still a bit above my budget, so I'm willing to go down to $125. Can you meet me at that price?
